root.name: Apidya
root.description: The game takes place in 5 different worlds which are again divided into multiple levels. Those stages are the sewer, a pond, a meadow, and a cybertechnological machine. The last stage consists of five very hard boss fights, but that stage can be skipped by choosing the "easy" difficulty mode. The avatar is a honey bee and the game features the genre-typical array of weapon upgrades and powerups.
